text: 15:19 Jenesis 8:21; Aghuzir Akaba 6:14; Jeremaia 17:9; Matyu 12:34; Mak 7:21Kɨ gumazamizibar nɨghnɨzibar otivir bizir kabav gei, nɨghnɨzir kuraba, ko gumazibav soagharɨzir araziba, ko gumazamiziba tintinibar uari isava akuir araziba, ko poroghamiba uari bakeir araziba, ko okɨmakɨar araziba, ko kotiabar gumazamizibagh ifarir araziba, ko gumazamizibar ziabagh asɨghasɨzir araziba.
